title: Hijas de la Luna
overview: The telenovela chronicles of four sisters named Juana Victoria (Michelle Renaud), a young woman who works in an inn and lives in Mexico City; Juana Soledad (Jade Fraser), a young lady who is a nurse; Juana Bárbara (Lorena Graniewicz), a regiomontana who practices boxing; and Juana Inés (Geraldine Galván), a Puebla novice. On Rosaura's deathbed, Juana Victoria's mother reveals to her daughter that her real father is a man named Juan Oropeza (Omar Fierro), a hotelier from Mazatlan, Sinaloa; She goes to meet him and discovers that in addition to having a half brother named Sebastián (Danilo Carrera), there is a possibility that she has three more sisters. Sebastián and Juana Victoria are given the task of finding them, and that is how it begins a story full of romance, adventures and unexpected encounters.
